speaker: CEO
quote: FY '25, we would probably grow slower than the system. FY '26, we may be at or around the system growth rate. FY '27, we should be faster than the system growth rate.

speaker: CEO
quote: We have been operating in a certain tight range. I think that should be maintained. In the medium term, I think we should be able to manage these margins in this particular range.

speaker: CFO
quote: Fees at about INR8,000 crores, grew by about 17% year-on-year. Third-party products, the distribution products have been quite strong. It grew by almost 32% in this quarter.

speaker: CEO
quote: We had thought that it would take four, five years to be at that level of what historically we have run, which is the mid-80s to high 80s. Instead of that, we will do it within two to three years.

speaker: CFO
quote: The deposits, what we have seen is that the industry has grown anywhere between 10.5%, 11%. And we have grown more than that, gaining market share any time period, if you take a year, three years or five years, between 50 to 70 basis points a year.

speaker: CEO
quote: As we speak today, we are in an extremely comfortable position. Obviously, there are risks in the system. The impact of what's going to happen in the macro side is something that you and I may not be able to predict, but we are well positioned.

speaker: CFO
quote: The loans that are floating, our external benchmark is roughly about 69%, 70% or thereabouts which is similar to what last quarter or the previous quarter that we had mentioned.

speaker: CFO
quote: We grew 240-odd branches in this quarter, 350 something for the year so far. Last year, we grew 917 branches. Our objective has been to make those investments and branches now when the credit has been benign.

speaker: CEO
quote: Liquidity has been gradually improving over the last couple of months. However, the deposit rates continue to be elevated and sticky -- probably the credit growth still outpaces deposit growth in the system.

speaker: CFO
quote: If you look at auto, we will be the number one. In cards, we are the number one. Various products on the retail non-mortgage when you think about it, we are the market leaders across various product segments.
